content: Yarn can be obtained right from the start of the game in Black Wind Mountain. Unlike some of the other Crafting Materials and Medicine Ingredients, there isn't a plant that you can harvest Yarn from. So, all your Yarn will need to be obtained from enemies.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yarn.md', within the main section titled 'Yarn', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Yarn Locations'.
The content is as follows:
Yarn can be obtained right from the start of the game in Black Wind Mountain. Unlike some of the other Crafting Materials and Medicine Ingredients, there isn't a plant that you can harvest Yarn from. So, all your Yarn will need to be obtained from enemies.
